channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta exec denies the company artificially boosted Llama 4’s benchmark scores
item.description: A Meta exec on Monday denied a rumor that the company trained its new AI models to present well on specific benchmarks while concealing the models’ we...

item.title: Google’s AI Mode now lets users ask complex questions about images
item.description: Google is bringing multimodal search to AI Mode, its Google Search experiment that lets users ask complex, multi-part questions and follow-ups to dig ...

item.title: 'Wi-Fi Keeps Going Down': Donald Trump's Return-to-Office Mandate Is Going Terribly
item.description: Dozens of federal employees tell WIRED the return-to-office order has resulted in widespread chaos, plummeting productivity, and significantly reduced...

item.title: 14 Best Bookshelf Speakers (2025): Active, Passive, and Hi-Fi
item.description: Soup up your sound with these active and passive speakers. We have picks for every budget.

item.title: The Switch 2’s GameChat Social Feature Could Revolutionize the Way You Play With Friends
item.description: GameChat allows up to 12 players to game together and is limited to friend lists as an added layer of protection.

item.title: Waymo may use interior camera data to train generative AI models, sell ads

item.title: Former Tesla exec Drew Baglino’s new startup is rethinking the electrical transformer
item.description: Heron Power is raising between $30 million to $50 million for a Series A, according to a report.

item.title: Analyst says Apple, Tesla have biggest exposure to Trump’s tariffs

item.title: SteelSeries Apex Pro Mini Gen 3: A Hall Effect 60% Keyboard
item.description: This could’ve been the apex of compact gaming keyboards, but it has a few too many flaws and a high price.

item.title: Nintendo Is ‘Actively Assessing’ What a Trade War Means for the Switch 2
